prompt:
Create a flange plate: main plate 140 mm x 140 mm x 10 mm. Since the tools don't support sketch-plane offsets, make the plate centered about the Top plane: sketch the 140x140 rectangle on Top and use cad_extrude with direction=SYMMETRIC and depth='5 mm' so total thickness is 10 mm.

Add a raised central boss: cylinder radius 25 mm, height 15 mm, merged (operation ADD) centered at origin on Top plane.

Add 8 bolt holes: diameter 10 mm on a bolt circle radius 55 mm (evenly spaced). Use a separate hole sketch and REMOVE THROUGH_ALL. Validate with onshape_snapshot_partstudio.
